snippet: The International Monetary Fund forecast economic growth for France in the second half of 2013 and called on President François Hollande’s government to stimulate domestic demand.
lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund forecast economic growth for France in the second half of 2013 and called on President François Hollande’s government to stimulate domestic demand.

headline.seo: I.M.F. Tells France to Continue to Focus on Growth
headline.main: I.M.F. Tells France to Continue to Focus on Growth
